alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued October 19 at 12:52AM AKDT until October 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 10 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 10 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds and blowing snow will reduce visibility to a quarter mile or less. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to increase substantially from the west Friday morning. Strongest winds are expected Friday night and Saturday when winds could gust as high as 60 mph. Winds and snow will begin to decrease Saturday night.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
